summary: EGR HAS BEEN REPLACED TWICE SINCE 1999 WHEN I BOUGHT THE VEHICLE. I JUST HAD THE EGR VALVE REPLACED YESTERDAY AND TODAY THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT IS BACK ON AND THE NASTY SMELL OF EXHAUST/FUEL IS BACK IN MY VEHICLE. I ALSO HAD THE CATALYTIC CONVERTER. REPLACED TWO WEEKS AGO. VEHICLE RUNS ROUGH AND STALLS WITHOUT NOTICE. SAFETY HAZARD! I HAVE TWO SMALL BABY'S AND FEAR FOR THEIR SAFETY BECAUSE OF BREATHING IN EXHAUST/FUEL AND VEHICLE STALLING WHENEVER. MDH IN VIRGINIA.    *NLM
